description: Ms. composite codex. Title from text 1.
abstract: Collection of Arabic and Persian texts on a variety of topics.
contents: 1. leaves 1b-12b: [Radd ʻalá khuṭbat ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Ījī ʻalá Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá] / Nūr Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Shushtarī.
2. leaves 14a-28b: [Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām] / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
3. leaves 30b-39b: [Sharḥ ḥadīth al-ṭīnah].
4. leaves 40b-74b: al-Nāfiʻ yawm al-ḥashar fī sharḥ Bāb al-ḥādī ʻashar / al-Miqdād ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Suyūrī.
5. leaves 75a-76b: [Extracts in Arabic and Persian].
6. leaves 76b-78a: Mughālaṭah mashhūrah bi-shubhat al-istilzām / Khalīl ibn al-Ghāzī al-Qazwīnī.
7. leaves 78a-80a: Risālah fī taḥrīm dhabāʼiḥ ahl al-kitāb / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
8. leaves 80b-82b: Risālah fī ithbāt ḥudūth al-ʻālam / Ḥusayn ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jīlānī.
9. leaves 83a-83b: [Lughz] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
10. leaves 84a-85b: [Extracts in Arabic and Persian].
11. leaves 86a-88a: Risālah iʻtiqādīyah / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
12. leaves 88b-89a: [Extracts in Arabic].
13. leaves 89a-93b: [Short treatise on geography].
14. leaves 94a-94b: Iʻtiqādāt / al-Shahīd al-Awwal.
15. leaves 95a-97b: [Extracts and notes in Arabic].
16. leaves 97b-99b: Risālah fī taqsīm al-ʻilm / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
17. leaves 100a-101b: Risālah fī baqāʼ al-nafs al-insānīyah baʻda kharāb al-badan / Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī.
18. leaves 102a-107a: [Risālah fī al-mughālaṭāt] / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
19. leaves 107b-108(bis)b: [Extracts in Arabic].
20. leaves 108a-108b: Risālah fī al-shubhah al-ʻawīḍah al-musammāt bi-shubhat al-istilzām.
21. leaves 108b-111b: Risālah dar is̲bāt-i vājib al-vujūd / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Waḥīd Jīlānī.
22. leaves 112a-116a: [Hadiths and extracts in Arabic].
23. leaves 116b-117a: [Extract from a treatise on geometry].
24. leaves 117b-120a: Risālah fī kayfīyat ṣudūr al-mawjūdāt ʻan mabdaʼihā / Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī.
25. leaves 120a-124a: [Extracts in Arabic and Persian].
26. leaves 124b-139b: [Tafsīr Āyat al-Kursī] / Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-Ḥusaynī.
27. leaves 140a-142b: Tafsīr Sūrat Tawḥīd / Avicenna.
28. leaves 142b-145a: Ḥāshīyah ʻArabīyah bar Sharḥ Shamsīyah.
29. leaves 145a-147b: Ḥāshiyat taʻaqqul bar Sharḥ Ṭawāliʻ.
30. leaves 147b-148a: [Verses in Persian and an extract in Arabic].
31. leaves 148b-159b: Risālah fī bayān al-rūḥ wa-al-ḥayāh wa-al-nafs wa-al-ʻaql wa-aqsāmihā wa-tawābiʻihā.
32. leaves 160a-163b: [Treatise on logical and grammatical fallacies].
33. leaf 163b: al-Risālah al-ʻAḍudīyah / ʻAḍud al-Dīn al-Ījī.
34. leaves 163b-167b: [Extracts in Arabic].
35. leaves 167b-171b: [Maktūb va maknūn] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
36. leaves 172a-175a: [Muqaddimah-i Dīvān-i Ḥāfiẓ] / Muḥammad Gulʹandām.
37. leaves 175b-176a: [Notes and extracts].
38. leaves 176b-183b: [Baḥth fī al-makān wa-al-jihah].
39. leaf 184a: [Notes].
40. leaves 184b-191a: Muntakhab az Qawsʹnāmah.
41. leaves 192b-199b: Kitāb al-Alfayn al-fāriq bayna al-ṣidq wa-al-mayn / Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
extent: 200 leaves : paper ; 198 x 130 mm bound to 198 x 134 mm

title.@value: [رد على خطبة حاشية على شرح الايجي على مختصر المنتهى].
[Radd ʻalá khuṭbat ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Ījī ʻalá Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá] ... [etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Quarter leather with blue paper covers.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
